name: stammering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
stammer
to speak or say something with unusual pauses or repeated sounds, either because of speech problems or because of fear or nervousness : [ + speech ] "Wh-when can we g-go?" she stammered. He dialled 999 and stammered (out) his name and address. Compare
stutter verb (SPEAK)
bumble
More examplesFewer examplesI stammered a bit when I was a boy.She stammered an apology and ran out of the room.He stuttered and stammered about having a busy schedule that week.
